blogPost.excerpt: It’s time for Planny 5. Planny 5 combines an all new design with many new features. Start to plan your day, complete all your daily tasks and review your recent productivity. Three simple steps to become more productive over time.
blogPost.body: It’s time for Planny 5. Planny 5 combines an all new design with many new features. Start to plan your day, complete all your daily tasks and review your recent productivity. Three simple steps to become more productive over time.
blogPost.title: Planny 5 - Plan and complete daily tasks across your Apple devices
blogPost.author: Kevin

localize.description: 是时候推出Planny 5了。Planny 5结合了全新的设计和许多新功能。开始计划你的一天，完成你所有的日常任务，并回顾你最近的生产力。三个简单的步骤，随着时间的推移，变得更加高效。
localize.tagline: 在你的 Apple 设备上计划并完成日常任务

localize.description: 是時候推出Planny 5了。Planny 5結合了全新的設計和許多新功能。開始計劃你的一天，完成你所有的日常任務，並回顧你最近的生產力。三個簡單的步驟，隨着時間的推移，變得更加高效。
localize.tagline: 在你的 Apple 設備上計劃並完成日常任務

previous.excerpt: Ark7 is a real estate investment platform where you can buy property shares at as low as $5 to earn passive monthly income and future appreciation. In the meantime, you don’t have to worry about property management because we take care of it.
previous.title: Ark7 - Real estate investment as easy as stocks

localize.description: 方舟7号是一个房产投资平台，在这里，您可以以低至5元的价格购买房产股，每月赚取被动收入和未来升值。同时，您不用担心物业管理，因为我们会负责。
localize.tagline: 房产投资像股票一样简单

localize.description: 方舟7號是一個房產投資平臺，在這裏，您可以以低至5元的價格購買房產股，每月賺取被動收入和未來升值。同時，您不用擔心物業管理，因爲我們會負責。
localize.tagline: 房產投資像股票一樣簡單

next.excerpt: Life is a magical journey; why not getting some souvenirs out of it? 1. Open the app. 2. Write down 3 things you are thankful for that day. 3. That's it! We are working on exciting features. Have fun with the innovative Souvenir gratitude tracker app!
next.title: Souvenir - A gratitude journal to track the good in your life

localize.description: 人生是一场神奇的旅行，为什么不从中获得一些纪念品呢？1. 打开应用程序。2. 写下当天你所感谢的3件事。3. 就这样吧! 我们正在努力开发令人兴奋的功能。祝你在创新的纪念品感恩追踪器应用中玩得开心!
localize.tagline: 追踪生活中美好事物的感恩日记。

localize.description: 人生是一場神奇的旅行，爲什麼不從中獲得一些紀念品呢？1. 打開應用程序。2. 寫下當天你所感謝的3件事。3. 就這樣吧! 我們正在努力開發令人興奮的功能。祝你在創新的紀念品感恩追蹤器應用中玩得開心!
localize.tagline: 追蹤生活中美好事物的感恩日記。
